entry.title: Installing Orchard CMS using SQL Server
entry.content: Welcome to Orchard Beginner! Today we'll learn how to install Orchard CMS using Microsoft WebMatrix and SQL Server.

entry.title: Installing Orchard CMS using SQL Server CE
entry.content: Welcome to Orchard Beginner! Today we'll learn how to install Orchard CMS using Microsoft WebMatrix and SQL Server CE(Compact Edition).

entry.title: Orchard Beginner - Comments in Orchard
entry.content: Welcome to Orchard Beginner! Comments are what make a blog/website more interactive and more social. In this post we'll be talking about how to handle and moderate comments for your Orchard website. Let's get started.

entry.title: Welcome To Orchard Beginner
entry.content:
Orchard Beginner is created with the aim to provide users and developers to have a Beginner's Guide to learn the ins and outs of Orchard.

We begin with the Basics of Orchard i.e. Talking about Basic site management, User management and then we step into more important features of Orchard like Queries, Projector, Taxonomies, Custom Forms, Workflows and Recipes.

After that we'll talk about how to Get Started with Theme Development in Orchard and later on Module Development too.

Again Welcome To Orchard Beginner.

Orchard Beginner

Happy Orcharding!!

entry.title: Discontinuing Orchard CMS Weekly Videos
entry.content:
Hello there,

I'll be discontinuing the Orchard CMS Weekly Tutorial Videos. Let me Welcome you to Orchard Beginner.

Orchard Beginner is created with the aim to provide users and developers to have a Beginner's Guide to learn the ins and outs of Orchard.

We begin with the Basics of Orchard i.e. Talking about Basic site management, User management and then we step into more important features of Orchard like Queries, Projector, Taxonomies, Custom Forms, Workflows and Recipes.

After that we'll talk about how to Get Started with Theme Development in Orchard and later on Module Development too.

Again Welcome To Orchard Beginner.

Orchard Beginner

Happy Orcharding!!
